Claim: "A person stands in the middle of a crowd of teenagers."
Implication: "Thus, a person stands in the middle of a crowd of teenagers."
Referring expressions: A person, crowd of teenagers  person, crowd, teenagers
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsInCrowd(a) and IsTeenager(b)))) -> (exists e (exists c (IsInCrowd(c) and IsTeenager(e))))
